definition: (American football) the position of the football player in the backfield who directs the offensive play of his team, play the quarterback
details:
noun
- (American football) the position of the football player in the backfield who directs the offensive play of his team
= example: (American football) the position of the football player in the backfield who directs the offensive play of his team
= synonyms: signal caller, field general
- (football) the person who plays quarterback
= synonyms: signal caller, field general
verb
- play the quarterback
